"Create a virtual art gallery using augmented reality technology that allows users to interact with and learn about different works of art from around the world."
"Design an app that uses machine learning algorithms to generate personalized abstract art based on user preferences and emotions."
"Develop a mobile game that challenges players to paint a masterpiece using only their phone's touchscreen."
"Create a website that allows users to upload their own artwork and receive feedback from other artists and art enthusiasts."
"Design a virtual reality experience that immerses users in a stunning natural landscape while allowing them to explore different artistic techniques and mediums."
